comments.comment:
Lets wait & see   Time is not a matter .You all were in the government. Somebody should have edit presidential candidate;s  sagith;speeches  .People trust Gotabaya than sajith. How did yr goverment  response to Easter  Sunday attacks. Dont talk too much  unwanted facts .It will be the failure for the next election.Still Sri Lankan likes matured  leader. preserve your votes .be think twice .GO  & STUDY - PAST POLITICAL HISTORY of UNP(  1st president  in Sri lanka). Presidential candidate should convince the people preciously  in his meeting . SAGITH TAIKS  much  in his meetings    But far more behind the opposition candidate.Gota convince our people. ACCEPT YOUR FAILURE  HONESTLY RATHER THAN BLAMING OTHERS. Country select a matured person.Correct decision  for the current situation.  Get courage& get together /avoid criticism of your own people/leadership, try to win the next event.Country prefer POLITICAL MATURITY .  NO need criticism 
   POHOTTUWA.they won no criticism among them self. Do politics in  Sri lanka //
 Sri lankan politics.
